title: BRIEF-African Oxygen Posts HY Headline Earnings Per Share Of 111.3 Cents, Increase Of 7%
text:
BRIEF-African Oxygen Posts HY Headline Earnings Per Share Of 111.3 Cents, Increase Of 7%

Stock Markets 34 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 07:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-African Oxygen Posts HY Headline Earnings Per Share Of 111.3 Cents, Increase Of 7% Sept 16 (Reuters) - African Oxygen Ltd : * SUMMARISED GROUP RESULTS AND DIVIDEND DECLARATIONFOR THE SIX MONTHS ENDED 30 JUNE 2019 * HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE 111.3 CENTS INCREASE OF 7% FROM 104 CENTS AT 30 JUNE 2018 * HY DIVIDEND 55.0 CENTS INCREASE OF 5.8% FROM 52 CENTS AT 30 JUNE 2018 * HY REVENUE R3 000 MILLION INCREASE OF 3.3% FROM R2 904 MILLION AT 30 JUNE 2018 * WILL CONTINUE TO FOCUS ON SPECIFIC GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES, STRICT COST MANAGEMENT AND EFFECTIVE PRICE COST RECOVERIES

BRIEF-African Oxygen Posts HY Headline Earnings Per Share Of 111.3 Cents, Increase Of 7%
